query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weekly_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  weekStartDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  weekEndDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  wentWell TEXT,
  challenges TEXT,
  nextWeekPlan TEXT,
  aiInsights TEXT,
  daysLogged INT DEFAULT 0,
  avgWinScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  weightChange INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId_week (userId, weekStartDate)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 38CTfHQgu7ziqf3.8ba454521095 --database naaABETn3TXZtukMehYNy8 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weekly_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  weekStartDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  weekEndDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  wentWell TEXT,
  challenges TEXT,
  nextWeekPlan TEXT,
  aiInsights TEXT,
  daysLogged INT DEFAULT 0,
  avgWinScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  weightChange INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_userId_week (userId, weekStartDate)
)
